description: A fall in crew in the Isle of Man fishing fleet is a "major difficulty", a trade organisation says.
title: Coronavirus: Further support 'could boost Manx fishing crew numbers'
title_page: Coronavirus: Further support 'could boost Manx fishing crew numbers' - BBC News
maintext: He said current crew levels were a "major difficulty" facing the island's fishing fleet and fishing had been "quite limited" during the summer months as vessel owners shared crews so that each boat could "at least fish some days".
